products.title: Chalfont Scarlet Roman Blind
products.description: Richly coloured, opulent and sophisticated, this gorgeous blind is a really classy way to dress your space in cosy warmth. The fabric is soft and natural-feeling, decadent almost, and when combined with that deep red hue its a blind that makes your home feel seriously upmarket richly coloured, opulent and sophisticated, this gorgeous blind is a really classy way to dress your space in cosy warmth.

products.title: Chalfont Mustard Roman Blind
